name: ASTROBEAT
description:
What is ASTROBEAT?

ASTROBEAT is a music based top down / twin stick shooter game in which you must fight hordes of enemies until the beat stops.

Key features

Choose between four different songs.

Fast paced top down / twin shooter gameplay.

Variety of weapons to choose from and enemies to fight against.

Challenge friends to beat your highscore!

Controls

WASD to move your ship!

Use your mouse to rotate the ship. 

Space button to shoot at incoming asteroids.

Credits

Aakash Malik - Programming, Art, Design and Music
